document_data.mainbody: '''Basil''' was a species of fragrant [[herb]] that received culinary usage across [[West Faerûn|west]], [[Northwest Faerûn|northwest]], and [[central Faerûn]].
document_data.Availability:
Jarred dried basil could be found among other [[spice]]s and herbs used for cooking in the City of Splendors, [[Waterdeep]]. Dried herbs and spiced found in the ruins of the ancient city of [[Myth Drannor]] included basil.{{Cite dragon/95/Into the Forgotten Realms|52}}

''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' offered basil in several directories, each packaged and priced differently. The ''Priest's Alcove'' offered 4 oz bags of basil for 7 [[gp]], a single ounce from ''Aurora's Larder'' was sold for a single [[sp]], and a pint of basil [[jelly]] costed 5 sp.

Usages.Medicine: Some believed that basil was a curative herb, beneficial for the afflictions of nervous system.
Usages.Magic: The ''[[find familiar]]'' [[spell]] required [[material component]] – 100 [[gold]] [[coin|pieces]] worth of [[incense]], basil, [[savory]], and [[catnip]].

document_data.Trivia: Basil's distinct sweet herbal aroma was imitated by the [[bloodthorn]] plant, mixed with the scent of [[mint]]. [[Saurial]]s exuded aroma of basil when they felt desire or longing.
